index_terms: CHICAGO MILWAUKEE ST PAUL PACIFIC RAILROAD
summary: An ordinance relating to the Water Department; accepting the amended offer to the Chicago, Milwaukee, St. Paul and Pacific Railraod Company to purchase certain real estate in Section 24, Township 22 North, Range 6 East, W. M.; and authorizing the execution and delivery of a deed therefor; and repealing Ordinance No. 73538.
